amendment.description: To limit the availability of funds authorized for contributions for international peacekeeping activities.

action.text: Amendment SA 273, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 273 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 273 proposed by Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S3175; text: CR S3175) To limit the availability of funds authorized for contributions for international peacekeeping activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 273 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 273 proposed by Senator Lugar.
